ngiemboon: Pacwóŋ lekwɔʼɔ́ pɔɔn, ambʉ̀ʉ gwɔ́ wɔɔn.
en: Here are the descenders of the hill, the climber is this one.

ngiemboon: Gʉa ńkẅé nkáb ya mbwó yé ńdɔg ńtó.
en: Go to his house and get the money to bring.
do with the means on board
tip over while occupying a large surface area
sag, occupying a large surface area
